projects.title: Gantt and management tools for client
tasks: Collaborated closely with the PM to estimate, plan and execute a full refactor of two old projects.
Coordinated with the BE team new API calls improving the DX and optimizing the platform performance.
Led the migration of the angular 8 projects to Angular 16, incorporating new best practices and improving code quality meeting SonnarQube quality standards.
Supervised a junior developer in the creation of unit test in Jasmine and E2E test in Cypress for the newly developed code ensuring proper coverage.
Improved the local dev environment with a dockerized version of the BE and created new pipelines to streamline the delivery process in Jenkins and OpenShift.
Contributed to writing technical documentation of the new features required by the client and helped to estimate the tasks.

projects.title: Full stack GIS app
tasks: Leaded the front-end development of an existing angular GIS project. Including CRUD of layers, data manipulation with leaflet and creation of Pdf reports.
Refactored the code to optimize it and divided the components in modules to handle lazy loading.
Improved support to different formats of layers with the help of the leaflet library.
Written scripts to monitor and keep running the BE and the geoserver.
Helped in the configuration of the Geoserver and the decision on how to implement solutions to optimize the performance.

projects.title: Bank dashboard
tasks: In charge of the state management service and the architecture of the data flow using RxJS and GraphQL for a fully reactive app.
Worked close to the PM and the designer to produce a responsive UI / UX according to the requirements of the client.
Coded with reusability and simplicity in mind to create a easy to read and maintainable code.
Responsible of controlling the code quality of the new developers.

projects.title: Full stack Fitness app
tasks: Built the frontend with Angular using Material UI for styling. Focusing on modularity and separation of concerns.
Coded the backend using Node, with Express and postgreSQL with Prisma.
